CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Revenue_MM_Asia__c ) , "N/A" , TEXT( Currency_Revenue__c ) + " " + IF ( Revenue_MM_Asia__c >= 1000, TEXT( Revenue_MM_Asia__c / 1000 ) + " BN" , TEXT( Revenue_MM_Asia__c ) + " MM" ) ) + if(OR ( ISNULL(TEXT( RD__c )), TEXT( RD__c ) = "--"), ""," "+TEXT(RD__c) )
CustomField.label: Revenue (Reporting - Asia)
